page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: Nearly all the farms in Risca are hillfarms. Some have horses,cows and sheep. And there is one pig farm. The farms have big feilds, and there are not many farms are at the top of the mountains. There are farmhouses stable and haysheds. Most of them have tractors and some of the farms hire machinery to do the harvesting and otherthings. Most of the farmers get up at six oclock to feed the animals. then put grass seed in their fields because none of them grow crops in the winter. The pig farm would sell about two pigs a month to be turned into bacon. The cow farms milk their cows every day with a machine that sucks the milk from the udders. the cows that had an affected udder would be connected to a specail tube which injects something to heal the udder
